Stand name: Thrift Shop.
Abilty: Takes small objects in the surrounding area and combines them into anything the user wishes but the objects cannot weigh more then five pounds. The Stands range is 5 meters from the user.


Edit: I'm pretty good at making Stands.

topics.body:
Stand name: Flash lights.

Abilty: Grants the user to fire rays of solar light like a beam/gun if in daylight, problem is the stand only can do so much until it needs to charge itself and if its dark its extremely weak and would need to be near a light source which would take a long time to charge and even then wouldn't do much but one attack per charge.
(Its also great at parties)
